name: Escape Time
description:
Escape Time is a 2D puzzle game where the player must use time and gravity portals to help the townsfolk avoid monsters and escape safely.

This is my first published game EVER thanks to the GameDev.tv Community Jam! 

Think of this game like lemmings but with portals and monsters. Each level has a specific amount of portals you can use to get the townsfolk in better positions. Timing and placement of each portal is key!

I hope you enjoy my game! 

Story

You are a wizard's assistant tower-sitting when the nearby town is attacked by monsters! Using the only magic scrolls you can find (you really should stop losing them), you try and help the townsfolk escape...

Controls

ESC/P -> Bring up the pause menu. 

R -> Retry level.

LEFT CLICK -> Select a scroll.

MOUSE -> Choose where to place portal.

RIGHT CLICK -> Unselect scroll.

ARROW KEYS/AD -> Move camera.

Hold SHIFT -> Speed up time.

SPACEBAR -> Pause/unpause and move camera.
